Class SerializedRMILinkProtocol

                      org.cougaar.mts.rmi.RMILinkProtocol
                          org.cougaar.mts.rmi.SerializedRMILinkProtocol
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, ServiceProvider, GenericStateModel
public class SerializedRMILinkProtocol
extends RMILinkProtocol

This LinkProtocol is a simple extension of RMILinkProtocol that uses preserialization to send byte-arrays via the SerializedMT interface rather than AttributedMessages via the MT interface.

Method Detail

getProtocolType

protected java.lang.String getProtocolType()
Overrides:
getProtocolType in class RMILinkProtocol
Returns:
an identifier of the protocol that can be used by the WP to distinguish them from one another.

computeCost

protected int computeCost(AttributedMessage message)
Overrides:
computeCost in class RMILinkProtocol
Returns:
the cost of transmitting the message over this protocol. This is invoked from the Link inner class and is defined here because the cost mathematics is typically not specific to a given link and is therefore easier to implement at the protocol level.

doForwarding

protected MessageAttributes doForwarding(MT remote,
                                         AttributedMessage message)
                                  throws MisdeliveredMessageException,
                                         java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                         CommFailureException
Description copied from class: RMILinkProtocol
Need to declare CommFailure exception even though it isn't thrown here because overriding methods can throw it. Keep eclipse happy by adding javadoc for it.
